Button.TooltipReference: Press to choose your character's appearance
Press to take back all of your starting stat choices
Right-click to place as many points as possible into Strength
Right-click to place as many points as possible into Stamina
Right-click to place as many points as possible into Agility
Right-click to place as many points as possible into Dexterity
Right-click to place as many points as possible into Wisdom
Right-click to place as many points as possible into Intelligence
Right-click to place as many points as possible into Charisma
Press to have a random name chosen for you
Uncheck this button to skip the tutorial and go directly to your starting city.
